metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13282 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: For GitLab before 13.0.12, 13.1.6, 13.2.3 after a group transfer occurs, members from a parent group keep their access level on the subgroup leading to improper access.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
